    • Uses of NoClusterException in uk.ac.cam.cl.juliet.master.clustermanagement.distribution

      Methods in uk.ac.cam.cl.juliet.master.clustermanagement.distribution that throw NoClusterException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long ClusterMasterUnit.sendPacket(Container msg) 
      long ClusterMaster.sendPacket(Container msg)
      Send the Container for processing with no callback on reply, success is pretty much guaranteed as the ClusterManger will buffer and retry if no response is received.
      long ClusterMasterUnit.sendPacket(Container msg, Callback cb) 
      long ClusterMaster.sendPacket(Container msg, Callback cb)
      Send the Container for processing and run the callback when a response is recieved, with the container as an argument, success is pretty much guaranteed as the ClusterManger will buffer and retry if no response is received.
